init_posts.title: Man must explore, and this is exploration at its greatest
init_posts.subtitle: Problems look mighty small from 150 miles up
init_posts.author: smetam
init_posts.content: Science cuts two ways, of course; its products can be used for both good and evil. But there's no turning back from science. The early warnings about technological dangers also come from science.

init_posts.title: Science has not yet mastered prophecy
init_posts.subtitle: We predict too much for the next year and yet far too little for the next ten
init_posts.author: smetam

init_posts.title: Man must explore
init_posts.subtitle: Problems look mighty small from 500 miles up
init_posts.author: smetam
init_posts.content: Science cuts two ways, of course; its products can be used for both good and evil. But there's no turning back from science.
